title: How to want to see your future - Quora

response.answer_text: I want to see myself in the future … firstly I want to be good person .. after that I want to be a good doctor in after few year because I want to help poor people who can't afford best treatment from the doctors

In precisely the same manner as your picture yourself biting a piece of fresh lemon wedge in your mouth with your eyes closed. Hold that vivid image firmly in your headspace while you just feel all the sensory impressions of that refreshing experience.
